formElement.name: artifact_id
formElement.label: Artifact ID
formElement.description: Unique artifact identifier

formElement.name: submitted_by
formElement.label: Submitted by
formElement.description: User who originally submitted the artifact

formElement.name: last_update_date
formElement.label: Last Modified On
formElement.description: Date and time of the latest modification in an artifact

formElement.name: open_date
formElement.label: Submitted on
formElement.description: Date and time for the initial artifact submission

formElement.name: fieldset_1
formElement.label: Details
formElement.description: fieldset_default_desc_key

formElement.name: summary
formElement.label: Summary
formElement.description: One line description of the artifact

formElement.name: details
formElement.label: Original Submission
formElement.description: A full description of the artifact

formElement.name: severity
formElement.label: Severity
formElement.description: Impact of the artifact on the system (Critical, Marginal,...)

formElement.name: category
formElement.label: Category
formElement.description: Generally correspond to high level modules or functionalities of your software (e.g. User interface, Configuration Manager, Scheduler, Memory Manager...)

formElement.name: close_date
formElement.label: End Date
formElement.description: End Date

formElement.name: multi_assigned_to
formElement.label: Assigned to (multiple)
formElement.description: Who is in charge of this artifact

formElement.name: status_id
formElement.label: Status
formElement.description: Artifact Status

formElement.name: stage
formElement.label: Stage
formElement.description: Stage in the life cycle of the artifact

item.label: New
item.description: The artifact has just been submitted

item.label: Analyzed
item.description: The cause of the artifact has been identified and documented

item.label: Accepted
item.description: The artifact will be worked on.

item.label: Under Implementation
item.description: The artifact is being worked on.

item.label: Ready for Review
item.description: Updated/Created non-software work product (e.g. documentation) is ready for review and approval.

item.label: Ready for Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is ready to be included in the next build

item.label: In Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is in the build and is ready to enter the test phase

item.label: Approved
item.description: The artifact fix has been succesfully tested. It is approved and awaiting release.

formElement.name: resolution
formElement.label: Resolution
formElement.description: The resolution field indicates what happened to the bug.

formElement.name: assigned_to
formElement.label: Assigned to
formElement.description: Who is in charge of solving the artifact

formElement.name: cross_references
formElement.label: Cross references
formElement.description: List of items referenced by or referencing this item.

formElement.name: permissions_on_artifact
formElement.label: Permissions on artifact
formElement.description: Let users groups to define who can access an artifact.

semantic.description: Define the title of an artifact

semantic.description: Define the status of an artifact

semantic.description: Define the closed status that are considered Done

semantic.description: Define the contributor/assignee of an artifact

chart.title: Severity
chart.description: Number of Artifacts by severity level

tracker.name: Kanban Tasks
tracker.description: A tracker of tasks for kanban

formElement.name: fieldset_1
formElement.label: fieldset_default_bugs_lbl_key
formElement.description: fieldset_default_bugs_desc_key

formElement.name: artifact_id
formElement.label: Artifact ID
formElement.description: Unique artifact identifier

formElement.name: submitted_by
formElement.label: Submitted by
formElement.description: User who originally submitted the artifact

formElement.name: category_id
formElement.label: Category
formElement.description: Generally correspond to high level modules or functionalities of your software (e.g. User interface, Configuration Manager, Scheduler, Memory Manager...)

formElement.name: bug_group_id
formElement.label: Group
formElement.description: Characterizes the nature of the artifact (e.g. Feature Request, Action Request, Crash Error, Documentation Typo, Installation Problem,...

formElement.name: open_date
formElement.label: Submitted on
formElement.description: Date and time for the initial artifact submission

formElement.name: last_update_date
formElement.label: Last Modified On
formElement.description: Date and time of the latest modification in an artifact

formElement.name: severity
formElement.label: Severity
formElement.description: Impact of the artifact on the system (Critical, Major,...)

formElement.name: summary
formElement.label: Summary
formElement.description: One line description of the artifact

formElement.name: details
formElement.label: Original Submission
formElement.description: A full description of the artifact

formElement.name: fieldset_2
formElement.label: fieldset_status_bugs_lbl_key
formElement.description: fieldset_status_bugs_desc_key

formElement.name: resolution_id
formElement.label: Resolution
formElement.description: How you have decided to fix the artifact (Fixed, Work for me, Duplicate,..)

item.label: Invalid
item.description: The submitted bug is not valid for some reason (wrong description, using incorrect software version,...)

item.label: Wont Fix
item.description: The bug won't be fixed (probably because it is very minor)

item.label: Later
item.description: The bug will be fixed later (no date given)

item.label: Remind
item.description: The bug will be fixed later but keep in the remind state for easy identification

item.label: Works for me
item.description: The project team was unable to reproduce the bug

item.label: Duplicate
item.description: This bug is already covered by another bug description (see related bugs list)

formElement.name: status_id
formElement.label: Status
formElement.description: Artifact Status

item.label: Closed
item.description: The artifact is no longer active. See the Resolution field for details on how it was resolved.

formElement.name: assigned_to
formElement.label: Assigned to
formElement.description: Who is in charge of solving the artifact

formElement.name: fieldset_3
formElement.label: CC List
formElement.description: Dependency links from an artifact to one or several other artifacts

formElement.name: fieldset_4
formElement.label: Attachments
formElement.description: Attach virtually any piece of information to an artifact in the form of a file

formElement.name: fieldset_5
formElement.label: Dependencies
formElement.description: Establish a dependency link from an artifact to one or several other artifacts belonging to any of the tracker of any project

formElement.name: fieldset_6
formElement.label: References
formElement.description: Cross-reference any artifact, or any other object

formElement.name: fieldset_7
formElement.label: Permissions
formElement.description: Restrict access to artifact
